definition: to concern/on (some topic)/about/concerning/to have importance for
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve

sentences.english: I know him quite well, and there are wheels within wheels.
sentences.chinese: 我很了解他，那里的人事关系很复杂。

sentences.english: For Obama Sr. this was an issue of national autonomy.
sentences.chinese: 在老奥巴马看来，这事关民族自主。

sentences.english: There is a question about the accountability of these organizations and their transparency.
sentences.chinese: 这事关这些组织的解释责任和它们的透明度。

sentences.english: He said America's "primacy in the world" is at stake.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马说，这事关美国在世界的首要地位。

sentences.english: That car matters a great deal to him.
sentences.chinese: 那辆车对他来说事关重大。

sentences.english: Flag issue is radical, and route issue is relating to overall phase.
sentences.chinese: 旗帜问题至关重要，道路问题事关全局。

sentences.english: It’s whether the hard work and industry of our people is rewarded.
sentences.chinese: 这事关我们人民的辛劳工作和行业是否能得到回报。

sentences.english: When you're a financial institution you can't fool around.It's all about confidence.
sentences.chinese: 一家金融机构不能糊弄人，这是事关信心的问题。

sentences.english: Commissariat safety is the major problem that the issue involves country and area society stability.
sentences.chinese: 粮食安全是事关国家和地区社会稳定的重大问题。

sentences.english: The bureau chief thinks to matter to importance and immediately turn up.
sentences.chinese: 所长认为事关重要，立即转上。

sentences.english: This is an argument for solidarity.
When you're a financial institution you can't fool around. It's all about confidence.
sentences.chinese: 一家金融机构不能糊弄人，这是事关信心的问题。

sentences.english: As this is a matter which concerns the whole school, the entire student body will be present.
sentences.chinese: 由于事关整所学校，所以所有学生都要出席。

sentences.english: House prices concern millions of households.
Accelerating the economic development of counties is important to the national economy.
sentences.chinese: 加快县域经济发展，事关国民经济的发展大局。

sentences.english: The quality of statistical data influences the science of Macroeconomic policy-making.
sentences.chinese: 统计数据质量事关宏观社会经济政策制定的科学性。

definition: to live or die/to exist or perish
major event/major political event (war or change of regime)/major social event (wedding or funeral)/(do sth) in a big way/CL:件[jian4],樁|桩[zhuang1]
lit. pull one hair and the whole body moves/fig. a slight change will affect everything else/the butterfly effect
pinyin: qian1 yi1 fa4 er2 dong4 quan2 shen1

definition: large scale program of lasting importance/project of paramount importance/to think big/annual national audit
to share the same interests (idiom)/to be closely related/to be in the same boat
pressing in on one's eyelashes (idiom); imminent
of the utmost importance/of highest priority
